title: S13 Ep15: Cursed by The Bell Witch and Bizarre Hauntings
itunes:title: Cursed by The Bell Witch and Bizarre Hauntings
description:
Today we are Cursed by The Bell Witch & Bizarre Hauntings on Beyond the Darkness with Nick White.

Nick White was the lead investigator on the A&E Miniseries Cursed: The Bell Witch and has been surrounded by the paranormal his whole life.
Today he shares his insights on the Legend of The Bell Witch and his own frightening encounters with the supernatural + a Brand New Theater of the Mind with a Black Eyed Kid Encounter!

Visit his site here: Cagethedarkness.com

www.Casper.com/darkness and use the code Darkness at check out to save $50 off select mattresses
